Portable Agile C++ Classes.

Function Documentation

XML::Document & PACC::operator>> ( XML::Document &  inDocument,
Vector &  outVector 
)

Extract vector outVector from XML document inDocument.

This method uses the first data tag of the parse tree to read the vector. The corresponding tree root is then erased. Any read error throws a std::runtime_error.

Definition at line 132 of file Vector.cpp.

00133 {
00134     XML::Iterator lNode = inDocument.getFirstDataTag();
00135     outVector.read(lNode);
00136     inDocument.erase(lNode);
00137     return inDocument;
00138 }

XML::Document & PACC::operator>> ( XML::Document &  inDocument,
Matrix &  outMatrix 
)

Extract matrix outMatrix from XML document inDocument.

This method uses the first data tag of the parse tree to read the matrix. The corresponding subtree is then erased. Any read error throws a std::runtime_error.
